name: Dodge n' Leap
description:
Fancy your chances of escaping a spaceship that's hurling towards earth? 

Yep?! Then take control of a scared robot trying its best to escape before its imminent destruction. Dodge your way through a whole lot of debree, storage and even a frying pan (Yes you read that right) to get out alive! 

Those not enough? Then try your chances with the defender drones trying to stop you from escaping. But be sure to watch out for their deadly blasts...

How To Play:

Movement - W A S D

Thrust / Leap - Space Bar / Shift Key

The music in the game has been purchased by us before the jam and edited within the jam for use.
